transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
At the start of the turn, inflicts Cursed on two random enemies for 1 turn (Irremovable)
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge reduction
transcend.5_1:
ATK DEF HP +22%
+25 Action Points at battle start
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+100% Effectiveness
Right after attacking, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response

SKT_FIRST.name: Kitsunebi
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy with Heavy Strike.
Has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict Cursed on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Irremovable)

SKT_BURST_3.effect:
Changes to Enhanced Skill
Targets all enemies
Resets all skill cooldowns of the caster
Extra Turn

description:
Attacks an enemy with Heavy Strike.
Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000086_1_1]</color> chance to inflict Cursed on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000086_1_1] turn(s)</color>. (Irremovable)

SKT_SECOND.name: Bite 'Em, Kitsu!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike.
For each target damaged, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color>, and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict Cursed on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. (Irremovable)
description:
Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike.
For each target damaged, increases Priority of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000086_2_2]</color>, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000086_2_3]</color> chance to inflict Cursed on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000086_2_3] turn(s)</color>. (Irremovable)

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: All Ties Are But Dreams
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc:
Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and recovers Chain Points by <color=#28d9ed>15</color>.
After attacking, detonates all Cursed stacks on the target and reduces Action Points by <color=#28d9ed>80</color>.
description:
Attacks all enemies with Heavy Strike and recovers Chain Points by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000086_3_1]</color>.
After attacking, detonates all Cursed stacks on the target and reduces Action Points by <color=#28d9ed>80</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000086_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000086_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000086_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Cursed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000086_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>. Applies <color=#28d9ed>Heavy Strike</color> to this attack.
